attributes.action: T&C's and Privacy Policies should have short summary of major points.
attributes.additional_details: If it was your job to read privacy policies for 8 hours per day, it would take you 76 work days to complete the task. Nationalized, that's 53.8 BILLION HOURS of time required to read privacy policies. The researchers came up with hypothetical national cost for all of those lost work hours: $781 billion. 6 Mar 2012 (techland.time.com)
attributes.background: Companies write 100s of pages of Terms and Conditions for every product/service they provide. Consumers don't read them. 7% read them. e.g. Amazon's Kindle T's & C's are 73,198 words long. Consumers don't know what they are accepting. A short summary of the main factors should be made clear.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on companies, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
